text.text: A flyer for some kind of candy.  It shows a picture of a gleaming human made of smooth candy looking at you in terror.  "SugarKin; the first life-size human candy!  Are you a real monster?  Will you be able to devour it all?"
"The candy is coming to life. Is it really okay to eat it now?"
"I saw a spider made of FUCKING Big League Chew. He ate Jimothy. Oh god."
"I thought I was high, but no. The gummy bears are in fact alive."
"really fucked up of my comfort food to get up and wave at me."
"I made this cookie last week, and now its walking around. Am I a parent?"
"In the land of Ooo theres a candy kingdom, with sidewalks you can eat~"
"Candy Mountain, Charlie! Come to Candy Mountain!"
"Guys my candy wife is cheating on me with a pickle man, what do I do?"
"I got a golden ticket but the chocolate factory had already been breached :("
"When I was told it was the end of the world, junk food coming to life was not on my bingo card."
"guys the candy is weak to chili powder, pass it on."
"I met a boy made of sugar today. He was really friendly, until it started to rain. Poor boy melted to gloop."
"Of all the things for the zombies to be fine with, why is the living candy it?"
"How to ascend. Step 1: Cover yourself in honey"
"They told me i was mad! Insisted "You can't bring candy to life!" I'll show them. I'll show them all!"
